attributes.action: All members of Parliament to do one month's work placement in an unskilled job.
attributes.background: It has become increasingly obvious that elected MP's are increasingly out of touch with their electorate. Many have only ever experienced life from within their elitist private school bubble, have never had a "real" job, and still cannot understand why we voted to leave the EU, among other things.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for individual MPs and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
